centerpiece: To empty a bagless vacuum cleaner without mess
options: To prevent a mess when emptying a bagless vacuum cleaner, remove the barrel from the cleaner using the deploy button, take a big bin liner and wrap it over the bottom of the chamber and half-way up the chamber itself. Replace the chamber and tie the bag off.

correct_options_literal: You will do a braid from the first left upper side down to the bottom right side.

centerpiece: To power off your iPhone,
options: press and hold the button on the right side of the phone for 3 seconds, then move the slider on the screen to the right.
press and hold the buttons on the left side of the phone for 3 seconds, then move the slider on the screen to the right.
correct_options_literal: press and hold the button on the right side of the phone for 3 seconds, then move the slider on the screen to the right.

centerpiece: How to cut drywall panels?
options: Cut through the paper into the gypsum core with a utility knife then while supporting the drywall sheet on the back apply pressure to the face causing it to break along the joint. Then cut through the paper on the back of the drywall sheet with your utility knife.

Cut through the paper into the gypsum core with a utility knife then without supporting the drywall sheet on the back apply pressure to the edges causing it to break along the joint. Then cut through the paper on the back of the drywall sheet with your utility knife.
correct_options_literal: Cut through the paper into the gypsum core with a utility knife then while supporting the drywall sheet on the back apply pressure to the face causing it to break along the joint. Then cut through the paper on the back of the drywall sheet with your utility knife.

centerpiece: How can I make my margarita more sour?
options: Add a few drops of non sour fruit juice and stir with a spoon.
Add a few drops of lemon or lime juice and stir with a spoon.
correct_options_literal: Add a few drops of lemon or lime juice and stir with a spoon.

centerpiece: How do I get rid of a bug infestation in my vegetable garden?
options: Use a strong fertilizer until the bugs are gone.
Use a strong fertilizer until the bees are gone.
correct_options_literal: Use a strong fertilizer until the bugs are gone.

centerpiece: How can I make chocolate ice cream?
options: Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Mix them together and then place in a freezer to chill.
Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Mix them together and then place in a oven to chill.
correct_options_literal: Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Mix them together and then place in a freezer to chill.

centerpiece: To make homemade air freshener.
options: Get any type of wax/scent warmer, fill about a tablespoon of quartz crystals into it. Turn it on (or light it up) and enjoy the smell.
Get any type of wax/scent warmer, fill about a tablespoon of laundry crystals into it. Turn it on (or light it up) and enjoy the smell.
correct_options_literal: Get any type of wax/scent warmer, fill about a tablespoon of laundry crystals into it. Turn it on (or light it up) and enjoy the smell.

centerpiece: how do you pop your ears?
options: pull them.
yawn.

centerpiece: How to remove the seems from jeans and turn into a skirt?
options: Use small scissors or a seam ripper to undo the inseam. You should have two wide flared rectangle pieces and two thinner rectangles. Arrange the pieces as shown, wide, thin, wide, thin and sew apart to make a skirt.

Use small scissors or a seam ripper to undo the inseam. You should have two wide flared rectangle pieces and two thinner rectangles. Arrange the pieces as shown, wide, thin, wide, thin and sew the seams together to make a skirt.
correct_options_literal: Use small scissors or a seam ripper to undo the inseam. You should have two wide flared rectangle pieces and two thinner rectangles. Arrange the pieces as shown, wide, thin, wide, thin and sew the seams together to make a skirt.

centerpiece: What liquid can be used to help clean cartridge-based video games?
options: Isopropyl alcohol.
Citric acid.
correct_options_literal: Isopropyl alcohol.

centerpiece: making the forms
options: Cut 10 centimeters of card stock and wrap it around a pencil then wrap that in tape.
Cut 10 centimeters of card stock and wrap it around a ruler then wrap that in tape.

centerpiece: To make pancakes without making a mess.
options: Put pancake mix into an empty pickle jar to help make more efficient pancakes in a cleaner kitchen.
Put pancake mix into an empty ketchup bottle to help make more efficient pancakes in a cleaner kitchen.
correct_options_literal: Put pancake mix into an empty ketchup bottle to help make more efficient pancakes in a cleaner kitchen.

centerpiece: How do you sharpen scissors?
options: To sharpen plain, household scissors that are very dull, start by using the smooth side of a bench stone. Simply open the scissors and place the edge to be sharpened on the stone. Pull the blade toward you from one end of the stone to the other while maintaining contact with the stone.

To sharpen plain, household scissors that are very dull, start by using the coarse side of a bench stone. Simply open the scissors and place the edge to be sharpened on the stone. Pull the blade toward you from one end of the stone to the other while maintaining contact with the stone.
correct_options_literal: To sharpen plain, household scissors that are very dull, start by using the coarse side of a bench stone. Simply open the scissors and place the edge to be sharpened on the stone. Pull the blade toward you from one end of the stone to the other while maintaining contact with the stone.

centerpiece: To determine if someone has romantic feelings for you,
options: ensure that the person seems very quiet and reserved around you.
observe if their body language seems really open and excited to you.
